label: ham
subject: Re: [R] A More efficient method?
body: 73 (return) [ Scilicet extern¾ superbi¾ sueto, non inerat notitia nostri, (perhaps _nostr¾;_) apud quos vis Imperii valet, inania transmittuntur. Tacit. Annal. xv. 31. The gradation from the style of freedom and simplicity, to that of form and servitude, may be traced in the Epistles of Cicero, of Pliny, and of Symmachus.]
